cloud-exa-infra
***************


Description
===========

Details of the cloud Exadata infrastructure resource. Applies to
Exadata Cloud Service instances only.


Available Commands
==================

* add-storage

* change-cloud-exadata-infrastructure-subscription

* change-compartment

* configure-exascale

* create

* delete

* get

* get-cloud-exadata-infrastructure-unallocated-resources

* list

* update
